title: Fan, 1873
medium:
Medium: wood, paper, silk
Technique: applied chromolithography printing
creditline: Gift of Mrs. James O. Green
description:
Brisé fan with pierced wood sticks, threaded with blue silk ribbon and with a blue silk tassel.  On the obverse, a chromolithograph is pasted onto the sticks. 
This fan was an inexpensive souvenir from the 1873 Vienna World Exposition. The image on the front of the fan, of the Industrial Palace exhibition pavilion, was mass produced using chromolithography (color lithography).

tombstone.epitaph:

1873. Medium: wood, paper, silk
